RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 1 350 Y Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Purse 19800. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 124 lbs. non starters preferred.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOVE THE ECHO V broke out, under pressure, held. ITS POLITICAL broke in, steady bid. MISS ME YETT close throughout. MALAMUTE SALOON drifted in. JESS MUY HOMBRE crowded start. APOLITICAL TRES crowded start. JLC WILD ROSEMARY broke in. NO ILLUSION no mishap. BARYSTA no mishap. LIL MISS MONARCH outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Barysta
ENTRY.OWNER: Draper Robyne Schoenhofer Julie A and Mitchell Catherine E

ENTRY.NAME: Jess Muy Hombre
ENTRY.OWNER: Gallegos, Miguel Y. and Gallegos, Mauricio

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Purse 19800. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE TWISTER SISTER inched away, best. I SAY WATCH N SEE broke in, chased, gamely. CHRISTIAN PRIZE in close, solid effort. FULL THROTTELL no mishap, steady bid. AMERICAS RUNAWAY bobbled start, crowded. EYES ON PANAMA came in start. SILVER MINER drifted in. MOONSHINYN broke slowly. ON THE QUIET broke in.

ENTRY.NAME: I Say Watch N See
ENTRY.OWNER: Jess F Burner and Stubbs Wesley

ENTRY.NAME: Full Throttell
ENTRY.OWNER: Amestoy Leslie A Amestoy Pierre Jean and Beasley Roger K

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 13200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLEASE THE COURT broke out and was off a bit slowly, steadily advanced in a rail trip, got up near the sixteenth pole, drew clear and held off the late charge of SECRETARY AT WAR. SECRETARY AT WAR bumped at the start, settled off the pace in a good position, rallied on the turn, bid five wide, closed willingly and was gaining late. CAIRO KING was never far back, raced outside, swung eight wide leaving the turn and finished well to get up for show. TEQUILA TIME sprinted clear, set the pace to late stretch and was unable to sustain his bid. VODKA TWIST was unhurried early, raced outside in an even effort and failed to threaten. SOUTHERN SUMMER bumped at the start and showed brief speed only. Hand timed.

ENTRY.NAME: Please the Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, off slow, steady advance rail, up late, held

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, set pace to late stretch, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Summer
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, brief speed only, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Secretary At War
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, settled off pace, 5wide bid, closed, gaining late

ENTRY.NAME: Cairo King
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, raced outside, 8wide bid, finished well, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Vodka Twist
ENTRY.OWNER: Fuentes Yesika Fuentes Ivan Alfonso and Escobar Francisco Andres
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, raced outside, even effort, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 4 400 Y Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000. New Mexico Bred Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EYE A ALLSTAR dueled, best. NINE WALKS dueled, outfinished. TELLEM IM HIGH in close, not enough. FAST PRIZE FIVE clear path, good effort. CARTEL COPY steady bid. PRETTY BOY AR clean trip. EAGLE RUNNER broke slowly. KAMIKAZEEE no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Eye a Allstar
ENTRY.OWNER: Rich Haskell E and Rich Jacque M

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 5 350 Y Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 35200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LA BRUJITA MAYOR dueled, proved best. PARKER DAM broke in, bumped, vied, outfinished. PENNER ASH drifted out, hung late. WARM RED WINE bumped both sides, drifted in. RIDE AROUND clear path, no rally. PRECIOUS DYNASTY reluctant to load, bumped both sides, crowded late. MAGABY no mishap. SOCKIT TOOYA bumped start, crowded late.

ENTRY.NAME: Precious Dynasty
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, bumped both sides, crowded late

ENTRY.NAME: La Brujita Mayor
ENTRY.OWNER: Schoenhofer Julie A and Vasquez Maricela

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SANTIAGO'S TOWER pressed the pace three across, fell back on the turn, went six wide entering the stretch, came again and got up at the wire. WHEREDOESTHECASHGO got away well, vied to the turn, drew clear and was caught at the wire. BLACK EYED BANDIT was void of early speed, angled out on the turn, bid eight wide and finished well to get up for show. LIFE JACKET broke out, stalked the pace towards the outside, went seven wide at the top of the stretch, bid and didn't have enough late. POOF HE'S GONE moved up inside, vied to the turn, fell back and leveled off. AWESOME STORM was taken outside, raced close to the pace, dropped in entering the turn, stopped and was not urged in the stretch. Hand timed.

ENTRY.NAME: Poof He's Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up inside, vied to turn, fell back, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Santiago's Tower
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 3across, fell back turn, came again 6w, up wire

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken outside, close to pace, dropped in turn, not urged stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Black Eyed Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, angled out turn, 8w bid, finished well, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Wheredoesthecashgo
ENTRY.OWNER: Carnes Tony P and Cappellucci Dick
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, vied to turn, drew clear, caught wire

ENTRY.NAME: Life Jacket
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, stalked outside, 7wide bid, not enough

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 7 440 Y Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 37000. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAST FLASHN straight path, inched away, best. RC JESSA FLASHN in tight early, pushed in. CARTEL SUPERSTAR came in start, vied, good effort. CQ FEATURED FIRST broke in, came in early. LOVE THAT JESS bumped start. JESS A CARTEL PRIZE broke awkwardly, bumped. DRINKING CHAMPANE in tight early, pushed in. NOLANS MOON broke slowly. CAPORAL RUNAWAY drifted, no threat. JESS A RESPONSE outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Cartel Superstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in start, vied, good effort

TRACK.NAME: SANDY RIDGE AT THE RED MILE

ENTRY.NAME: Love That Jess
ENTRY.OWNER: Anti Gravity Customs and Moscot Nahum

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 8 350 Y Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 43600. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EFFORTLESS CANDY CAT brushed start, inched away. TINA KATARINA chased, couldn't gaint. FS POWER MAXX in close, not enough. NO MIRES A LA LUNA no mishap. HUNKY MCGOO broke in, pushed out. KINGS TOUCH broke out. FLASH COLTRANE evenly, no threat. DON CHUY C outrun. JESS TO REEL brushed start.

ENTRY.NAME: Fs Power Maxx
ENTRY.OWNER: Ford Richard E and Sorenson Fred

ENTRY.NAME: Hunky McGoo
ENTRY.OWNER: Robertson William R and Robertson Mary

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 23900. FOR REGISTERED NEW MEXICO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ABSTRACT LILLY set a pressured pace, responded when challenged to duel through the stretch, drifted out, exchanged bumps and prevailed at the wire. TURN ON ARCH broke out and bumped at the start, pressed the pace four wide, challenged on the turn, dueled through the stretch in tight quarters and exchanged bumps. MISS JAX raced mid pack along the inside, angled out into the turn, bid five wide and closed well to earn show. SMASH AWAY was slow early, went six wide at the top of the stretch and offered a mild bid to improve position. BYE BYE BROOKY was slow early, raced inside in an even effort and failed to menace. MISS FLUFFY pressed the pace to the turn, dropped back and gave way. BELLA Y SOFIA bumped at the start, trailed the field and passed a tiring rival. RUNNING FOR GRACE pressed the pace along the inside, fell back on the turn, angled out and stopped. Following a stewards' inquiry, ABSTRACT LILLY was disqualified and placed second for causing interference in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Jax
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, angled out into turn, 5wide bid, closed well

ENTRY.NAME: Bye Bye Brooky
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, raced inside, even effort, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Running for Grace
ENTRY.OWNER: McDonald Bryan and Lambert Casey T
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, fell back turn, angled out, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Smash Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, 6wide top of stretch, mild bid, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Fluffy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to turn, dropped back, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Abstract Lilly
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, responded to duel, drifted out, bumped, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Turn On Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, pressed 4w, challenged turn, dueled, bumped,

ENTRY.NAME: Bella Y Sofia
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed, passed tiring rival

RACE.RACE_TEXT: RUIDOSO DOWNS RACE 10 330 Y Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VF MR FINE drew clear, held safely. RC HEZA FLASHN DREAM vied, outfinished. DADDY DOLLAR OS close throughout. SECOND TO NO OTHER hopped, came in start. HOCKED UP steady bid. STONE COLD DYNASTY bumped start. JESS REYLI DASH bumped start. TF EYES JESSA ROGUE broke in, bumped. NATIONALLY RANKED broke in, bumped.
